EntryName	PRM3_HUMAN
ProteinName	Protamine-3 (Sperm protamine P3)
GeneName	PRM3
Length	103
Function	Protamines substitute for histones in the chromatin of sperm during the haploid phase of spermatogenesis. They compact sperm DNA into a highly condensed, stable and inactive complex (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Chromosome
